summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the levy and collection of a new assessment or re-assessment to pay the cost and expense of the improvement of Seattle Boulevard, from Connecticut Street to Massachusetts Street; 9th Avenue South, from Massachusetts Street to Seattle Boulevard; Seattle Boulevard, from 9th Avenue South to 8th Avenue South; 8th Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard to south boundary of City of Seattle, as specified and provided for in Ordinance No. 10676, and providing payment therefor.
